creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of funds from The Northern Star Foundation and The Hersey Foundation
description: Suite of five color etchings with aquatint on ivory Bodleian laid paper; housed in a handmade paper portfolio with ink-stamped title on cover.
inscription: Signed, Dated, Numbered Titled, Stamped, and Chop Mark
signed:
LC: each sheet: [on 11.12.1980 / Steven Sorman]
LC: Each sheet: [ap 2/6]
LC: Each sheet: [What this is / [title of individual etching]]
LC: Artist\'s Stamp in red ink
LR: VEL Chop Mark
title: What This Is (Sit Down)
